item.title: 🚀 One Micro Start Up Per Month #1
item.description: Note: The initial version was sent out to my newsletter recipient on the 31std of January 2021. This version has some slight adjustements. Welcome to the first issue of 🚀 One Micro Startup Per Month The last weeks have been quite an adventurous ride for me. On the day I launched my January product I had a power cut in my house. Yeah, a real one. Didn’t charge my laptop over night - 30% battery.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hi, I’m Future Founder I will publish my articles here every other day. More info on the about page. Enjoy and talk soon. FF

item.title: Who is the Future Founder and what is this site?
item.description: Greetings, my friend from the world wide web. This website is the result of me failing at publishing online on a regular basis. I often faced many struggles with (old) new publishing technologies, which got in my way of just writing and publishing. That is why I have re-thought the way in which I bring things online. This website makes it easy to just write & publish. No bloated add ons, ads, extension or other things that get in your and my way.
